rows.label: qev092905_MSG0010
rows.name:
Well, well, well. Hm.
Not a surprise, but still unexpected...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0020
rows.name:
Huh. What's it doing out here in
the far reaches of space...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0030
rows.name:
Ah, I'm sorry.
I've been keeping you in the dark, haven't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0040
rows.name: Well, as it turns out, our ringy friend here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0045
rows.name: ...is a planetary engineering system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0050
rows.name: Put simply, it's a terraforming device.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0060
rows.name: Though, that's not the thing that bothers me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0070
rows.name:
It's the fact that...there is Qlurian tech
incorporated into its workings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0080
rows.name:
Our technology borrows heavily
from "Ancient Samaar,"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0085
rows.name: the oldest civilization in the known universe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0090
rows.name:
This led to worship, and after a few thousand years,
we reached unparalleled levels of prosperity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0100
rows.name:
Our ancestors sought to spread our faith across the galaxy—
preaching to other races, and sharing our tech.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0110
rows.name:
The alien civilization who made this ring—
they must have been one of those races.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0120
rows.name: Although, given the state of this barren landscape...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0125
rows.name: It looks as though they had another use in mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0130
rows.name:
Ironic, that a tool meant to facilitate life...
was ultimately used to destroy it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_JNK0140
rows.name: Console

rows.label: qev092905_SEL0150
rows.name: Offer her a few words of comfort.

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0160
rows.name: Ha ha. That's sweet of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0170
rows.name:
You're a kind soul.
If only everyone were like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0180
rows.name: Maybe then history would have played out differently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_JNK0190
rows.name: Be Ruthless

rows.label: qev092905_SEL0200
rows.name: Tell her bluntly that life is cruel.

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0210
rows.name:
Yeah. In those days, the Qlu dogmatically
believed in universal kindness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0220
rows.name:
When they realized the folly of their actions,
Qlurians shut themselves off from all else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0230
rows.name:
Ever since, we've jealously guarded our tech and faith,
and entrenched our society in rules. It's sad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0240
rows.name: So the reason I survey ruins,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0250
rows.name:
is to seek out vestiges of the tech my ancestors
disseminated, and to deal with them appropriately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0260
rows.name:
To conserve any artifacts that may
still be operational.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0265
rows.name: Or, if they're being mishandled, to destroy them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0270
rows.name:
Although, in this ring's case, it seems to be
completely out of commission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0280
rows.name: I can breathe easier knowing that.[ST:wait ]
